title: Black Screen after pressing "LAUNCH" on League of Legends.....
body:
Hello everyone.

 You are probably tired of seeing all of these "BLACK SCREEN PLEASE HELP" posts, but I've tried all the solutions I have seen for the past 3 days and I can't seem to figure out the problem. My friends at school say it might be because I have a bad computer: 8 GB of RAM, i5 intel processor, 60 gb on (C:) drive. It's a Windows 7, but I can't activate it because I don't have the product key or whatever it is so I can't update to Windows 10. Please help I've wanted to play this game really badly, but I keep running into the same problem over and over again. Thanks for your time.

replies.body: I am having the same problem !! DId you figure it out ?!

Black screen issues usually result from network issues that's being blocked from downloading assets or establishing a connection.  The steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should get you fixed up.  You can also use the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to automatically configure some of your settings like with firewalls.  That should get you squared away!
